result.eng: She heard his voice around noon.
result.ga: chuala sí a ghuth um nóin
result.orig: chuala sí a ghuth um nóin
result.html: chuala sí a ghuth um nóinShe heard his voice around noon.
result.ponchtml: ċuala sí a ġuṫ um nóinShe heard his voice around noon.

result.html: mheall a glór méHer voice wooed me.
result.ponchtml: ṁeall a glór méHer voice wooed me.

result.eng: She has the voice of a crow. She sounds like a crow.
result.html: tá glór préacháin aiciShe has the voice of a crow. She sounds like a crow.
result.ponchtml: tá glór préaċáin aiciShe has the voice of a crow. She sounds like a crow.

result.eng: At the top of her voice, she called:...
result.ga: i mbarr a gutha ghlaoigh sí
result.orig: i mbarr a gutha ghlaoigh sí
result.html: i mbarr a gutha ghlaoigh síAt the top of her voice, she called:...
result.ponchtml: i mbarr a guṫa ġlaoiġ síAt the top of her voice, she called:...

result.eng: He thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ga: dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.orig: dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.html: dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithneHe thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ponchtml: dar leis gur ċeart dó glór a ċinn a aiṫneHe thought he should recognize his voice.

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ga: dar le babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.orig: dar le babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.html: dar le babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ponchtml: dar le babaí gurḃ é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aiṫne aċ ní raiḃ dul aici smaoineaṁ cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
